abstract: The game Web site failed to meet profit targets that were tied to half of the acquisition’s $700 million purchase price.
snippet: The game Web site failed to meet profit targets that were tied to half of the acquisition’s $700 million purchase price.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — Club Penguin, the subscription-based online community acquired by the Walt Disney Company in 2007, has failed to meet profit targets that were tied to $350 million in payouts to the Web site’s creators.

headline.main: Club Penguin Misses Goals, Giving Disney a Half-Price Deal
headline.print_headline: Club Penguin Misses Goals, Giving Disney a Half-Price Deal
